title: Science Writing Instructional Design for Pre-service EFL Teachers Integrating Critical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing critical thinking-based scientific writing strategies for pre-service teachers to apply in future educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can write argumentative essays structuring logical claims on scientific topics
Learners can evaluate analytical depth of scientific essays using peer feedback protocols
Learners can demonstrate critical thinking processes by revising essays at least three times using mobile device-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
